label: Task-8
title: Cover LinkedIn post about Issues-FS News site launch
description: Dinis Cruz posted about the news site launch on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:ugcPost:7427154122086318080/ _ This is the second LinkedIn publication about the project (first was the ChatGPT interview article). Catalog this as a milestone: the Journalist's news site going from feature request to live site in one session, now being shared publicly. Consider writing a brief or article about the public launch and audience reception.
